title: Permission
description: Backport of [FHIR R6 Permission](https://build.fhir.org/permission.html) using FHIR Questionnaire

item.text: Avoid putting internal SDS ids in here
The person or entity that asserts the permission
Presume this is text for now, can be increased in compexity
The selection criteria to identify data that is within scope of this provision
Expression identifying the data (this is not correct)
A description or definition of which activities are allowed to be done on the data
NHS Number, GMC or GMP Code
The purpose for which the permission is given
